title: league keeps on crashing lost lp
body:
Hi, i dont know why league keeps crashing. Everytime i go into the loading screen of a game, it would crash or say i have disconnected (internet works fine) then everytime i try to reconnect it would keep saying i've disconnected until it said that the game has ended and that ive lost lp for dodging... And if i did happen to get into a game and i would alt tab out of the game, it would crash again... ive lost so a bit of lp cause if it now... plz help...
[Edit] and ive updated all drivers and repaired the league client multiple times now and it still happens

replies.body:
Sorry to hear about the LP loss here, and I suggest from here on out we stick to custom games until this gets fixed up.  When you say crash, are there any specific error messages like a bug splat?  If it's just a disconnection notice, then your network could have issues specifically reaching different services like the game server.  This is totally possible regardless of how amazing one's internet or connection might be.  You should go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.

You can also use the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to auto-configure your firewall settings in case that's the culprit.  Let me know if you have any questions.

Thanks for this info!  Bugsplats usually happen if something like a bad game file or driver fails to render the game.  In this case, I instead suggest going over the steps in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to fix that up, then test it in a custom.  I hope that helps!

Hi, I had the same problem a while back with the same message however, It was due to the compatibility. Apparently I had to set it to be compatible to windows 8 (my computer runs windows 10).  This worked as a temporary solution until now. I was able to play a few days ago without any problems. However today without any major updates happening, the same problem occurred. I tried looking at the compatibility and followed the guide. I also disabled Nvidia's "Share" feature and xBox's DVR feature. 

Help would be appreciated!
